reference.shortdesc: A list item is an item in either an ordered or unordered list.

section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: Although rendering is left up to implementations, processors typically use the following conventions for displaying the contents of li elements:

ul.li: In ordered lists, list items are indicated by numbers or alphabetical characters.
In unordered lists, list items are indicated by bullets or dashes.
